column.name: fk_guild_rank_guild
column.comment: Foreign key to guild_rank table.

column.name: fk_guild_rank
column.comment: Foreign key to the rank.

column.name: fk_petition
column.comment: Foreign key to the petition item that this character has signed.

column.name: fk_account
column.comment: The account ID in which this character resides. Foreign key to account.

column.name: name
column.comment: The name of the character.

column.name: race
column.comment: The race of the character. 1 1 Human 2 2 Orc 3 4 Dwarf 4 8 Night Elf 5 16 Undead 6 32 Tauren 7 64 Gnome 8 128 Troll

column.name: fk_dbc_class
column.comment: The Class Id of the character. Foreign key to ChrClasses.dbc

column.name: gender
column.comment: The Sex/Gender of the character. Value Gender 0 Male 1 Female

column.name: level
column.comment: The current level of the designated player.

column.name: xp
column.comment: The total amount of xp that the signified player has.

column.name: money
column.comment: This is the amount of copper the character possesses.

column.name: position_x
column.comment: The x position of the character’s location.

column.name: position_y
column.comment: The y position of the character’s location.

column.name: position_z
column.comment: The z position of the character’s location.

column.name: fk_dbc_map
column.comment: Map Identifier, Foreign key to Map.dbc

column.name: orientation
column.comment: The orientation the character is facing. (North = 0.0, South = 3.14159)

column.name: online
column.comment: Records whether the character is online (1) or offline (0).

column.name: cinematic
column.comment: Boolean 1 or 0 controlling whether the start cinematic has been shown or not.

column.name: totaltime
column.comment: The total time that the character has been active in the world, measured in seconds.

column.name: leveltime
column.comment: The total time the character has spent in the world at the current level, measured in seconds.

column.name: logout_time
column.comment: The time when the character last logged out, measured in Unix time.

column.name: rest_bonus
column.comment: The remaining amount of XP bonus for rested characters.

column.name: resettalents_cost
column.comment: The cost for the character to reset its talents, measured in copper.

column.name: resettalents_time
column.comment: The last time the character has performed a reset of his talents.

column.name: trans_x
column.comment: The X position of the character if he's on a transport.

column.name: trans_y
column.comment: The Y position of the character if he's on a transport.

column.name: trans_z
column.comment: The Z position of the character if he's on a transport.

column.name: trans_o
column.comment: The O position of the character if he's on a transport.

column.name: fk_transguid
column.comment: The global unique ID of the transport if applicable. Foreign key to transport.

column.name: stable_slots
column.comment: The number of stable slots the player has available. Maximum is 2.

column.name: fk_dbc_zone
column.comment: The zone ID the character is in. Foreign key to WorldMapArea.dbc

column.name: death_expire_time
column.comment: Time when a character can be resurrected in case of a server crash or client exit while in ghost form.

column.name: fk_dbc_taxi_path
column.comment: Stores the players current taxi path (TaxiPath.dbc) if logged off while on one.

column.name: honor_highest_rank
column.comment: Internal honor rank for mangos (value 0 to 18).

column.name: honor_standing
column.comment: Displayed rank in game (-4 to 14, Pariah to High Warlord)

column.name: stored_honor_rating
column.comment: Amount of stored honor so far.

column.name: stored_dishonorable_kills
column.comment: Amount of stored dishonorable kills so far.

column.name: stored_honorable_kills
column.comment: Amount of stored honorable kills so far.

column.name: fk_dbc_watchedFaction
column.comment: ID of the watched faction by this character. Foreign key to Faction.dbc.

column.name: drunk
column.comment: Boolean flag indicating whether the character is drunk or not.

column.name: health
column.comment: Current health of the character.

column.name: power1
column.comment: The amount of mana for this character.

column.name: power2
column.comment: The amount of rage for this character.

column.name: power3
column.comment: The amount of focus for this character.

column.name: power4
column.comment: The amount of energy for this character.

column.name: power5
column.comment: The amount of happiness for this character.

column.name: fk_ammoId
column.comment: ID of the ammo item. Foreign key to item_instance.

column.name: deleted
column.comment: Boolean value indicatiing whether this character is deleted or not.

column.name: deleteDate
column.comment: The date at which the account was deleted.

column.name: skin
column.comment: Byte value for this character's skin. This value is part of the playerBytes information.

column.name: face
column.comment: Byte value for this character's face. This value is part of the playerBytes information.

column.name: hairstyle
column.comment: Byte value for this character's hairstyle. This value is part of the playerBytes information.

column.name: haircolor
column.comment: Byte value for this character's haircolor. This value is part of the playerBytes information.

column.name: facialhair
column.comment: Byte value for this character's facial hair. This value is part of the playerBytes2 information.

column.name: unknownByte
column.comment: Byte value -- unknown usage. This value is part of the playerBytes2 information.

column.name: bankbagslot
column.comment: Byte value for this character's bank bag slot count. This value is part of the playerBytes2 information.

column.name: resttype
column.comment: Byte value for this character's rest type. This value is part of the playerBytes2 information. Possible values are from 0 to 7 (values can be combined together): 1 - RESTED 2 - NORMAL 4 - RAF-LINKED

column.name: changename
column.comment: Force the character to change name at login. This value is part of the at_login_flag information.

column.name: resetspell
column.comment: Boolean value indicating whether the character will have spell reset at login or not. This value is part of the at_login_flag information.

column.name: resettalents
column.comment: Boolean value indicating whether the character will have talents reset at login or not. This value is part of the at_login_flag information.

column.name: charcustom
column.comment: Boolean value at login, unknown effect. This value is part of the at_login_flag information.

column.name: groupleader
column.comment: Flag value indicating whether this character is group leader or not. This field is part of the playerFlags information.

column.name: afk
column.comment: Flag value indicating whether this character is afk or not. This field is part of the playerFlags information.

column.name: dnd
column.comment: Flag value indicating whether this character is dnd or not. This field is part of the playerFlags information.

column.name: gm
column.comment: Flag value indicating whether this character is gm or not. This field is part of the playerFlags information.

column.name: ghost
column.comment: Flag value indicating whether this character is ghost or not. This field is part of the playerFlags information.

column.name: resting
column.comment: Flag value indicating whether this character is resting or not. This field is part of the playerFlags information.

column.name: unknown7
column.comment: Unknown flag usage. This field is part of the playerFlags information.

column.name: ffapvp
column.comment: Flag value indicating whether this character is in ffa pvp mode or not. This field is part of the playerFlags information.

column.name: contestedpvp
column.comment: Flag value indicating whether this character is in contested pvp mode or not. This field is part of the playerFlags information.

column.name: inpvp
column.comment: Flag value indicating whether this character is in pvp or not. This field is part of the playerFlags information.

column.name: hidehelm
column.comment: Flag value indicating whether this character is hidding helm or not. This field is part of the playerFlags information.

column.name: hidecloak
column.comment: Flag value indicating whether this character is hidding cloak or not. This field is part of the playerFlags information.

column.name: partialplaytime
column.comment: Flag value indicating whether this character has played a long time or not. This field is part of the playerFlags information.

column.name: noplaytime
column.comment: Flag value indicating whether this character has played too long or not. This field is part of the playerFlags information.

column.name: unknown15
column.comment: Unknown usage. This field is part of the playerFlags information.

column.name: unknown16
column.comment: Unknown usage. This field is part of the playerFlags information.

column.name: sanctuary
column.comment: Flag value indicating whether this character is in a sanctuary zone or not. This field is part of the playerFlags information.

column.name: taxibenchmark
column.comment: Flag value indicating whether this character is in taxi benchmarking mode or not. This field is part of the playerFlags information.

column.name: pvptimer
column.comment: Flag value indicating whether this character has the pvp timer enabled or not. This field is part of the playerFlags information.

column.name: gmon
column.comment: Flag value indicating whether this character has the gm mode enabled or not. This field is part of the ExtraFlags information.

column.name: gmaccepttickets
column.comment: Flag value indicating whether this character is accepting tickets or not. This field is part of the ExtraFlags information.

column.name: gmacceptwhispers
column.comment: Flag value indicating whether this character is accepting whispers or not. This field is part of the ExtraFlags information.

column.name: gmtaxicheat
column.comment: Flag value indicating whether this character is using taxi cheats or not. This field is part of the ExtraFlags information.

column.name: gminvisible
column.comment: Flag value indicating whether this character is invisible or not. This field is part of the ExtraFlags information.

column.name: gmchat
column.comment: Flag value indicating whether this character shows is GM badge in the chat or not. This field is part of the ExtraFlags information.

column.name: gmauctionneutral
column.comment: Neutral auction flag. This field is part of the ExtraFlags information.

column.name: gmauctionenemy
column.comment: Enemy auction flag. This field is part of the ExtraFlags information.

column.name: pvpdeath
column.comment: Store the PvP status until the corpse is created. This field is part of the ExtraFlags information.

column.name: note
column.comment: The guild note of this player, visible by everybody.

column.name: officernote
column.comment: The officer note for this character, visible only by allowed ranks.

column.name: home_x
column.comment: The x position of the resting location.

column.name: home_y
column.comment: The y position of the resting location.

column.name: home_z
column.comment: The z position of the resting location.

column.name: home_orientation
column.comment: The orientation of the resting location.

column.name: home_fk_dbc_map
column.comment: Map Identifier, Foreign key to Map.dbc (Resting location)

column.name: home_fk_dbc_zone
column.comment: The zone ID the character is in. Foreign key to WorldMapArea.dbc (Resting location)

column.name: fk_from
column.comment: Character Global Unique Identifier of the sender. Foreign key to characters.

column.name: fk_guid
column.comment: Global Unique Identifier, foreign key to the characters table.

column.name: fk_owner
column.comment: Foreign key to the owner of this item.

column.name: fk_event_receiver
column.comment: The receiver of this event.

column.name: fk_to
column.comment: Character Global Unique Identifier of the receiver. Foreign key to characters.

column.name: fk_guid
column.comment: Global Unique Identifier of the character. Foreign key to characters.

column.name: fk_owner
column.comment: The GUID (Global Unique Identifier) of the character. Foreign key to characters.

column.name: fk_owner
column.comment: Character Global Unique Identifier. Foreign key to characters.

column.name: fk_relation
column.comment: Friend Global Unique Identifier, foreign key to the characters table.

column.name: fk_from
column.comment: guid of sender of the whisper

column.name: fk_guid
column.comment: Global Unique Identifier, foreign key to characters.

column.name: fk_event_sender
column.comment: The initiator of the event.

column.name: fk_character
column.comment: The GUID of the character sending the ticket. Foreign key to characters.

column.name: fk_to
column.comment: guid of receiver of the whisper
